Title: Busy farming season picture
Publisher: Xin meishu chubanshe (新美术出版社), Shanghai
Notes: Harvest on a cooperative farm. The little red flag in the foreground says "Xiaoshan Village Agricultural Production Cooperative" (小山村 農業生產合作社). This could be Xiaoshan ("Small mountain") in Liaoning province, where agricultural cooperatives were established soon after Liberation.
